io.github.jonestimd.swing.validation

Class ValidatedTextField

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.text.JTextComponent
            • javax.swing.JTextField
              • io.github.jonestimd.swing.validation.ValidatedTextField
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ValidatedComponent, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.Scrollable, javax.swing.SwingConstants

    public class ValidatedTextField
extends javax.swing.JTextField
implements ValidatedComponent
    Extends JTextField to add validation. Uses ValidationBorder to provide visual feedback when there is a validation error. Validation is disabled when the component is not editable.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
